item.title: Mysql的Json相关操作
item.description: Mysql Json相关操作 官方文档 1. 合并两个json数组(不去重) - `select JSON_MERGE_PRESERVE('["1"]','["1","2","3"]');` 结果：`["1", "1", "2", "3"]` 2. 合并两个json数组(去重) - `select JSON_MERGE_PATCH('["1"]','["1","2","3"]');` 结果：`["1", "2", "3"]` 3. 查询json对象字段 sku字段内容：`{name:"校服"}` - `SELECT sku->"$.name" FROM trade_store_sku` 结果：`"校服"` - `SELECT sku->>"$.name" FROM trade_store_sku` 结果：`校服` 4. 赋值 - `SELECT JSON_SET('{"name":"校服"}', "$.name", "秋装")` 结果：`{"name": "秋装"}` - `SELECT JSON_SET('["1","2","3"]', "$[1]", "秋装")` 结果：`["1", "秋装", "3"]` 5. 删除 - `SELECT JSON_REMOVE('{"name":"校服"}', "$.name")` 结果：`{}` - `SELECT JSON_REMOVE('["1","2","3"]', "$[1]")` 结果：`["1", "3"]`
